!Atuba Chief Varkees: Tejakar Oroka! The Orcs have thousands of tribes! However, only seven tribes carry on the noble blood! I am going to sing their names, so listen well! The brave Hestui! The cold-hearted Atuba! The persistent Neruga! The strong-willed Urutu, the resourceful Duda-Mara! And the merciless Gandi! One more thing! There are tribes of traitors that betrayed their own kind! Their names are forgotten! [npc_%objectId%_Chat 0|Return]
